TextBody:
Hello Roque,

Please let me know if the test build that I provided is working as expected and if the CAP policies are being applied.

Thank you,
Emil

Hello Roque,

Here is a test build that you can install on one of the computers and test if the issue can be still reproduced:
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp25102024/EPPMac3.0.4.1001.Notarized.tar
https://download.endpointprotector.com/custom_agent/Epp25102024/EPPClient_v6.2.4.1001.zip

Please let me know the outcome once you have the chance to test if the issue can be reproduced.

Thank you,
Emil
